Articles.Content:
In this Promo Clip for the upcoming film adaptation of the book "the Martain" the crew is ask some questions after being isolated from any other human being for a long time... like my Kerbals tend to be when, for instands, a duna encounter goes ... slightly off plan. Alex Vogel is one of the third crew to fly to mars. When asked if " in terms of the mission" he feels any fears, he, smiling like Jeb being punched into the sky says, no ... IÃ‚Â´m german. We donÃ‚Â´t feel fear.

Also I love the book and cant wait for the Movie.

Aaaand im blowing up tons of rocketparts trining to build the Hermes.
